monogr.title: Prākr̥tapaiṅgalam
Saṁpādita Pāṭha, Pāṭhāṁtara, Hindī Anuvāda, Vyākhyā, Ṭippaṇī, Tīna Saṁskr̥ta Ṭīkāyēṁ Aur Śabdakōṣa Sahita

lg.l: jō vivihamattasāarapāraṁ pattō vi vimalamaïhēlaṁ ।
paḍhamabbhāsataraṁḍō ṇāō sō piṁgalō jaaï ॥
dīhō sañjuttaparō bindujuō pāḍiō a caraṇantē ।
sa gurū vaṁka dumattō aṇṇō lahu hōi suddha aïkālō ॥

lg.label: jihā
lg.l: māī rūē hēō hiṇṇō jiṇṇō a vuḍḍaō dēō ।
sambhuṁ kāmantī sā gōrī gahilattaṇaṁ kuṇaï ॥
katthavi sañjuttaparō vaṇṇō lahu hōi daṁsaṇēṇa jahā ।
parilhasaï cittadhijjaṁ taruṇikaḍakkhammi ṇivvuttam ॥
ihikārā bindujuā ēō suddhā a vaṇṇamiliā vi lahū ।
rahavañjaṇasañjōē parē asēsaṁ vi hōi savihāsaṁ ॥
māṇiṇi māṇahĩ kāĩ phala ēō ja caraṇa paḍu kanta ।
sahaja bhuaṁgama jaï ṇamaï kiṁ kariē maṇimanta ॥

lg.label: rahavañjaṇasañjōassa jahā
lg.l: cēu sahaja tuhum̐ cañcalā sundarihadahĩ valanta ।
paa uṇa ghallasi khullaṇā kīlasi uṇa ulhasanta ॥
jaï dīhō vi a vaṇṇō lahu jīhā paḍhaï hōi sō vi lahū ।
vaṇṇō vi turiapaḍhiō dāttiṇṇi vi ēka jāṇēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: arērē vāhahi kānha ṇāva chōḍi ḍagamaga kugati ṇa dēhi ।
taī ithi ṇadihĩ sam̐tāra dēi jō cāhahi sō lēhi ॥
jama ṇa sahaï kaṇaatulā tila tuliaṁ addhaaddhēṇa ।
tama ṇa sahaï savaṇatulā avachandaṁ chandabhaṁgēṇa ॥
abuha buhāṇaṁ majjhē kavvaṁ jō paḍhaï lakkhaṇavihūṇaṁ ।
bhūaggalaggakhaggahĩ sīsaṁ khuḍiaṁ ṇa jāṇēi ॥
ṭṭhaḍaḍhāṇaha majjhē gaṇabhēā hōti pañca akkharaō ।
chapacatadā jahasaṁkhaṁ chappañcacaüttidukalāsu ॥
ṭagaṇō tērahabhēō bhēā aṭṭhāi hōnti ṭhagaṇassa ।
ḍagaṇassa pañca bhēā tia ḍhagaṇē bē vi ṇagaṇassa ॥

lg.label: aha patthārō
lg.l: paḍhama guru hēṭṭhaṭhāṇē lahuā pariṭhavahu appabuddhīē ।
sarisā sarisā pantī uvvariā gurulahū dēhu ॥

lg.label: aha chakalapatthārē gaṇāṇaṁ ṇāmāī
lg.l: hara sasi sūrō sakkō sēsō ahi kamala bambha kali candō ।
dhua dhammō sāliarō tēraha bhēā chamattāṇaṁ ॥

lg.label: aha pañcakalāṇaṁ ṇāmā
lg.l: indāsaṇa aru sūrō cāō hīrō a sēharō kusumō ।
ahigaṇa pāpagaṇō dhua pañcakalē piṁgalēṁ kahiō ॥

lg.label: aha caükkalāṇaṁ ṇāmāī
lg.l: gurujua kaṇṇō guruanta karaala paōharammi gurumajjhō ।
āiguru vvasucaraṇō vipyō savvēhi lahuēhĩ ॥

lg.label: aha tiṇṇakalāṇaṁ ṇāmāī
lg.l: dhaa ciṇha cira cirālaa tōmaratumbūrupatta cuamālā ।
rasavāsapavaṇavalaaṁ lahuālambēṇa jāṇēhu ॥

lg.label: aha tialagaṇa [dui patthārassa ṇāmāī
lg.l: suravaï paṭavva tālā karatālāṇanda chandēṇa ।
ṇivvāṇaṁ sasamudaṁ tūraṁ ēha pyamāṇēṇa ॥

lg.label: aha tialagaṇa taïa patthārassa ṇāmāī
lg.l: bhāvā rasatāṁḍava ṇārīaṁ kuṇaha bhāviṇiaṁ ।
tilahugaṇassa kaïarō ia ṇāmaṁ piṁgalō kahaï ॥

lg.label: aha dukalāṇaṁ ṇāmāī
lg.l: ṇēurarasaṇābharaṇaṁ cāmaraphaṇimuddhakaṇaakuṁḍalaaṁ ।
vaṁkaṁ māṇasavalaaṁ hārāvali ēha guruassa ॥

lg.label: bilahu ṇāmāī
lg.l: ṇiapia paramaü supiē bilhu ti samāsu kaïdiṭṭha ।
aha caümattaha ṇāmaṁ phaṇirāō païgaṇaṁ bhaṇaï ॥
suraalaaṁ gurujualaṁ kaṇṇasamāṇēṇa rasiarasalaggaṁ ।
maṇaharaṇa sumaïlambia lahalahiaṁ tā suvaṇṇēṇa ॥

lg.label: aha antaguru ṇāmāī
lg.l: karapāṇikamalahatthaṁ bāhū bhuadaṁḍapaharaṇaasaṇiaṁ ।
gaabharaṇaraaṇaṇāṇābhuabharaṇaṁ hōti supasiddhaṁ ॥

lg.label: aha majjhaguru ṇāmāī
lg.l: bhuavaïasaṇaragaavaï vasuhāhivarajjugōvālō ।
uṇṇāakacakkavaī paaharathaṇaaṁ ṇarindāĩ ॥

lg.label: aha āiguru ṇāmāī
lg.l: paapāacaraṇajualaṁ avaru paāsēi gaṁḍavalahaddam ।
tāapiāmahadahaṇaṁ ṇēuraraïjaṁghajualēhĩ ॥

lg.label: aha savvalahuassa ṇāmāī
lg.l: paḍhamaṁ ērisi vippō bīē sarapañca jāisiharēhĩ ।
diavaraparamōpāē hōi caükkēṇa lahuēṇa ॥

lg.label: aha pañcakalāṇaṁ āilahuassa ṇāmāī
lg.l: suṇarindaahiakuñjarugaavarudantāi danti aha mēhō ।
ērāvaïtārāvaïgaaṇaṁ jhampaṁ ta lampēṇa ॥

lg.label: aha majjhala assa (ṇāmāī)
lg.l: pakkhivirāḍamaïndahavīṇāahijakkhaamiajōhalaaṁ ।
suppaṇṇapaṇṇagāsaṇagaruḍa viāṇēhu majjhalahuēṇa ॥
bahuvivihapaharaṇēhiṁ pañcakalaō gaṇō hōi ।
gaarahaturaṁgapāikka ēhu ṇāmēṇa jāṇa caümattā ॥
tāḍaṁkahāraṇēurakēuraō hōti gurubhēā ।
saramērudaṁḍakāhala lahubhēā hōti ēttāĩ ॥
saṁkhaṁ phullaṁ kāhala ravaṁ asēsēhĩ hōnti kaṇaalaaṁ।
rūaṁ ṇāṇākusumaṁ rasagandhaṁ saddaparamāṇaṁ ॥

lg.label: aha vaṇagaṇā
lg.l: mō tigurū ṇō tilahū lahuguruāīṁ yabhā ja majjhagurū ।
majjhalahū rō sō uṇa antagurū tō vi antalahuēṇa ॥

lg.label: aha gaṇadēvatā.
lg.l: puhavījalasihikālō gaaṇaṁ sūrō a candamā ṇāō ।
gaṇa aṭṭha iṭṭhadēō jahasaṁkhaṁ piṁgalē kahiō ॥
magaṇa ṇagaṇa dui mitta hō bhagaṇa yagaṇa hō bhicca ।
āsīṇa jata duaü gaṇa avasiṭṭhaü ari ṇicca ॥

lg.label: ahaṁ gaṇaphala
lg.l: magaṇa riddhi thirakajja yagaṇa suhasampaa dijjaï ।
ragaṇa maraṇa sampalaï jagaṇa kharakiraṇa visajjaḍa़ ॥
tagaṇa suṇṇa phala kahaï sagaṇa sahadēsu vvāsaï
bhagaṇa racaï maṁgala aṇēka kaï piṁgala bhāsaï ॥
jata kavva gāha dōhaï muṇahu ṇagaṇa hōi paḍhamakkharahi ।
tasu riddhi buddhi savvaī phurahi raṇa rāula duttara taraï ॥

lg.label: aha dugaṇa viārō
lg.l: mitta mitta dē riddhi buddhi aru maṁgala dijjaï
mitta bhicca thirakajja jujjha ṇibbhaa jaa kijjaï ।
mitta āsē kajjabandha ṇahi puṇu puṇu chijjaï
mitta hōi jaï sattu gōttabandhava pīḍijjaï ॥
aru bhicca mitta sava kajjahō bhicca bhicca āatti cala
sava bhicca uāsē dhaṇu ṇasaï bhicca vaïri hākanda phala ॥
uāsīṇa jaï mitta kajja kichu manda dikhāvaï
uāsīṇa jaï bhicca savva āatti calāvaï ।
uāsīṇa uāsē mandabhala kichu ṇahi dakkhia
āsīṇa jaï sattu gōtta vaïriu kaï lakkhia ।
jaï sattu mitta hō suṇṇaphala sattu bhiccahō gharaṇiṇasa
puṇu sattu āsē dhaṇa ṇasaï sattu sattu ṇāakka khasa ॥

lg.label: aha mattāṇaṁ uddiṭuṁ
lg.l: puvva juala sari aṁkā dijjasu । gurusira aṁkē sēsa maṭijjasu ।
uvaralaaṁka lakkhi kahu āṇahu । tē paridhua uddiṭṭhā jāṇahu ॥
ṇaḍhē savvakalā kārijjasu । puvva juala sari aṁkā dijjasu ।
pucchalaaṁka miṭāvahi sēkha । uvarala aṁka lōpi kahu lēkha ॥
jattha jattha pāvijjaï bhāga । ēhu kahaï phura piṁgala ṇāga ।
paramattā lēi gurutā jāi । jata lakkhahu tata lakkhahu āi ॥

lg.label: aha vaṇṇāṇaṁ uddiṭuṁ
lg.l: akkhara uppari duṇṇā aṁkā dijjahu muṇēhu uddiṭṭhā ।
lahu uppari jō aṁkō taṁ dēi ēkkēṇa jāṇēhu ॥

lg.label: āsāṁ ṇaṭuṁ
lg.l: ṇaḍhē aṁkē bhāga karijjasu । samabhāgahĩ tahi lahu mūṇijjasu ।
visama ēka dēi vaṁṭaṇa kijjasu । piṁgala jampaï guru āṇijjasu ॥

lg.label: aha vaṇṇamēru
lg.l: akkhara saṁkhē kāḍha karu āi anta paḍhamaka ।
sira dui aṁkē avaru bharu sūī mēru ṇisaṁka ॥

lg.label: aha assa patākā
lg.l: udiṭhṭhā sari aṁkā dijjasu । puvva aṁka parabharaṇa karijjasu ।
pāvala aṁka paḍhama paridijjasu । pattharasaṁkha patākā kijjasu ॥

lg.label: aha mattā mēru
lg.l: dui dui kāṭṭhā sari lihahu paḍhama aṁka tasu anta ।
tasu āihi puṇa ēkka saü paḍhamē bē vi milanta ॥
sira aṁkē tasu sira para aṁkē । uvarala kāṭṭa purahu ṇīsakē ।
mattāmēru aṁka sañcāri । bujjhahu bujjhahu jaṇa dui cāri ॥

lg.label: aha mattā patākā
lg.l: uddiṭṭhā sari aṁkā thappahu । vāmāvattē para lē luppahu ।
ēkka lōpa aïkka guru āṇahu । dui tiṇi lōpē dui tiṇi jāṇahu ।
matta patākā piṁgala gāva । jō pāvaï sō parahi milāva ॥

lg.label: aha vittassa lahuguruāṇaṁ
lg.l: pucchala chanda kalā kaī pucchala vaṇṇa miṭāva ।
avasiṭē guru jāṇiahu lahu jāṇivvaü tāva ॥।dōhā।

lg.label: aha sakalapatthāra saṁkhā
lg.l: chabbīsā sattasaā taha sattāraha sahassāĩ ।
bāālīsaṁ lakkhaṁ tēraha kōḍī samaggāī॥50॥

lg.label: aha gāhāpaaraṇaṁ (atha gāthāprakaraṇam)
lg.l: hōi gāhū matta caüaṇṇa gāhāi sattāvaṇī ।
taha viggāha palaṭṭi kijjaï uggāhaü saṭṭhi kala ॥
gāhiṇī a bāsaṭṭi kijjaï ।
taha vi palaṭṭaï siṁhiṇī bē aggala hō sahi ।
sattarūa aṇṇōṇṇa gaṇa khandha matta caüsaṭṭhi ॥

lg.label: aha gāhū
lg.l: puvvaddhē uttaddhē sattaggala matta vīsā ।
chaṭṭhamagaṇa paamajjhē gāhū mēru vva jualāĩ ।52॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: candō candaṇa hārō tāva a rūaṁ paāsanti ।
caṁḍēsaravarakittī jāva ṇa appaṁ ṇidaṁsēi ॥

lg.label: aha gāhā
lg.l: paḍhamaṁ bāraha mattā bīē aṭṭhārahēhĩ sañjuttā ।
jaha paḍhamaṁ taha tīaṁ dahapañca vihūsiā gāhā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jēṇa viṇā ṇa jivijjaï aṇuṇijjaï sō kaāvarāhō vi ।
pattē vi ṇaaraḍāhē bhaṇa kassa ṇa vallahō aggī ॥
sattagaṇā dīhantā jō ṇa lahū chaṭṭha ṇēha jō visamē ।
taha gāhē vi a addhē chaṭhē lahuaṁ viāṇēhu ॥
savvāē gāhāē sattāvaṇṇāi hōti mattāī।
puvvaddhami a tīsā sattāīsā paradami ॥
sattāīsā hārā sallā jassaṁmi tiṇṇi rēhāī।
sā gāhāṇaṁ gāhā āā tīsakkharā lacchī ॥
tīsakkharāhĩ lacchī savvē vandanti hōi vikkhāā ।
hāsaï ēvaṁ ēkkaṁ vaṇṇaṁ tā kuṇaha ṇāmāī ॥
lacchī riddhī buddhī lajjā vijjā khamā a dēhīā ।
gōrī dhāī cuṇṇā chāā kantī mahāmāī ॥
kittī siddhī māṇī rāmā gāhiṇī visā a vāsīā ।
sōhā hariṇī cakkī sārasi kurarī sihī a haṁsīā ॥
paḍhamaṁ vī haṁsapaaṁ bīē sīhassa vikkama jāā ।
tīē gaavaraluliaṁ ahivaraluliaṁ caütthaē gāhā ॥
ēkkē jē kulamantī bē ṇāakkēhĩ hōi saṁgahiṇī ।
ṇāakahīṇā raṁḍā vēsā bahuṇāakā hōi ॥
tēraha lahuā vippī ēāīsēhiṁ khattiṇī bhaṇiā ।
sattāīsā vēsī sēsā sā suddiṇī hōi ॥
jā paḍhama tīa pañcama sattama ṭhāṇē ṇa hōi gurumajjhā ।
guvviṇiē guṇarahiā gāhā dōsaṁ paāsēi ॥

lg.label: aha viggāhā ।
lg.l: viggāhā paḍhama dalē sattāīsāī mattāī।
pacchima dalē ṇa tīsā ia jampia piṁgalēṇa ṇāēṇa ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: parihara māṇiṇi māṇaṁ pakkhahi kusumāī ṇīvassa ।
tumha kaē kharahiaō gaṇhaï guḍiādhaṇuṁ a kira kāmō ॥

lg.label: aha uggāhā
lg.l: puvvaddhē uttaddhē mattā tīsanti suhaa sambhaṇiā।
sō uggāhō vuttō piṁgala kaï diṭṭha saṭṭi mattaṁgō ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: sōūṇa jassa ṇāmaṁ aṁsū ṇaaṇāī sumuhi rundhati ।
bhaṇa vīra cēivaïṇō pakkhāmi muhaṁ kahaṁ jahicchaṁ sē ॥

lg.label: aha gāhiṇī siṁhiṇī
lg.l: puvvaddha tīsa mattā piṁgala pabhaṇēi muddhiṇi suṇēhi ।
uttaddhē battīsā gāhiṇi vivarīa siṁhiṇī bhaṇu saccaṁ ॥

lg.label: gāhiṇī jahā
lg.l: muñcahi sundari pāaṁ appahi hasiūṇa sumuhi khaggaṁ mē ।
kappia mēcchaśarīraṁ pacchaḍa़ vaaṇāīṁ tumha dhua hammīrō ॥

lg.label: siṁhiṇī jahā
lg.l: varisaï kaṇaaha viḍhēi tappaï bhuaṇē diāṇisaṁ jaggantō।
ṇīsaṁka sāhasakō ṇidaï indaṁ a sūrabimbaṁ a ॥

lg.label: aha khandhaā (atha skandhaka)
lg.l: caümattā aṭṭhagaṇā puvvaddhē uttaraddha hōi samarūā ।
sā khandhaā viāṇahu piṁgala pabhaṇēi muddhi bahusambhēā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jaṁ jaṁ āṇēi giri raïrahacakkaparighaṭṭaṇasahaṁ haṇuā ।
taṁ taṁ līlāi ṇalō vāmakaratthaṁhiaṁ raēi samuddē ॥
ṇandaü bhaddaü sēsa saraṁga siva bambha vāraṇa varuṇa ।
ṇīlu maaṇa tālaṁka sēharu saru gaaṇu sarahu vimaï ॥
khīra ṇaaru ṇaru ṇiddha ṇēhalu ॥
maagalu bhōalu suddha sari kumbha kalasa sasi jāṇa ।
sarahasēsasasahara muṇahu sattāisa khandhāṇa ॥
caü lahu katthavi pasara jahiṁ sō sahi ṇandaü jāṇa ।
guru ṭuṭṭaï bi bi lahu vaḍhaï taṁ taṁ ṇāma viāṇa ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: candā kundā kāsā hārā hīrā tilōaṇā kēlāsā ।
jēttā jēttā sēttā tēttā kāsīsa jiṇṇiā tē kittī ॥.

lg.label: aha dōhā
lg.l: tēraha mattā paḍhama paa puṇu ēārahĩ dēha ।
puṇu tēraha ēārahaï dōhā lakkhaṇa ēha ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: suraaru surahī parasamaṇi ṇahi vīrēśa samāṇa ।
ō vakkala ō kaṭhiṇataṇu ō pasu ō pāsāṇa ॥
bhamaru bhāmaru sarahu sēvāṇa maṁḍūka makkaḍu karahu ।
ṇaru marālu maagalu paōharu balu vāṇaru tiṇṇi kalu ॥
kaccha maccha sahūla ahivaru ।
vaghya virāḍaü suṇaha taha undura sappapamāṇa ।
guru ṭuṭṭaï bē lahu vaḍhaï taṁ taṁ ṇāma viāṇa ॥
chabbīsakkhara bhamara hō guru bāisa lahu cāri ।
guru ṭuṭṭaï bē lahu vaḍhaï taṁ taṁ ṇāma viāri ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jā addhaṁgē pavvaī sīsē gaṁgā jāsu ।
jō dēāṇaṁ vallahō vandē pāaṁ tāsu ॥
bāraha lahuā vippī taha bāīsēhiṁ khattiṇī bhaṇiā ।
battīsa hōi bēsī jā iarā suddiṇī hōī ॥
jassā paḍhamahiṁ tīō jagaṇā dīsanti pāa pāēṇa ।
caṁḍālaha ghararahiā dōhā dōsaṁ paāsēi ॥
chakkalu cakkalu tiṇi kalu ēma pari visama paanti ।
sama pāhĩ antakka kalu ṭhavi dōhā ṇibhanti ॥
diavaragaṇa dhari juala puṇa via tialahu paala
ima vihi vihu chaü paaṇi jima suhaï susasi raaṇi
iha rasiaü miaṇaaṇi ēadaha kala gaagamaṇi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: vimuha calia raṇa acalu pariharia haagaavalu
halahalia malaaṇivaï jasu jasa tihuaṇa piaï
varaṇasi ṇakhaï lulia saala uvari jasu phulia ॥
āikavva ukkaccha kiu lōhaṁgiṇi maha sāru ।
guru vaḍḍaï bi bi lahu ghaṭaï taṁ taṁ ṇāma viāru ॥
lōhaṁgiṇi haṁsīā rēhā tālaṁki kampi gambhīrā ।
kālī kalarudāṇī ukkacchā aṭṭha ṇāmāī ॥
lōhaṁgiṇi savva lahū jattha guru ēkka sā haṁsī ।
jaṁ jaṁ vaḍḍaï hārō ṇāmaṁ jō jattha sō tattha ॥[iti ukkacchā]

lg.label: aha rōlā
lg.l: paḍhama hōi caüvīsa matta antara guru juttē piṁgala hām̐tē sēsa ṇāa taṇhi rōlā uttē ।
ēggārāhā hārā rōlā chandō jujjaï ēkkē ēkkē ṭuṭṭaï aṇṇō aṇṇō vaḍḍaï ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: paabharu daramaru dharaṇi taraṇiraha dhullia jhampia kamaṭhapiṭṭha ṭaraparia mēru mandara sira kampia ।
kōha calia hammīravīra gaajūha sam̐juttē kiaü kaṭṭha hākanda mucchi mēcchahakē puttē ॥
kunda karaala mēha tālaṁka kalarudda kōila kamalu ।
indu sambhu cāmaru gaṇēsaru sahasakkhō sēsa bhaṇa ॥
ṇāarāa jampaï phaṇīsaru ।
tēraha akkhara jaṁ palaï iggāraha vaṁkēhĩ ।
akkhara akkhara jaṁ vaḍhaï taṁ taṁ ṇāma kuṇēhi ॥[iti rōlā]

lg.label: aha gandhāṇa
lg.l: dahasatta vaṇṇa paḍhama paa bhaṇaha suaṇā
taha bīaṁmi aṭṭhārahahiṁ jamaa jua caraṇā ।
ērisi a bīa dala kuṇahu bhaṇaï piṁgalō
gandhāṇā ṇāma rūaü hō paṁḍiajaṇacittaharō ॥
dahasattakkhara saṁṭhavahu paḍhamacaraṇa gandhāṇa ।
bīakkhara puṇu jamaa daï aṭṭhārahaï viāṇa ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: kaṇṇa calatē kumma calaï puṇuvi asaraṇā ।
kumma calatē mahi calaï bhuaṇabhaakaraṇā ।
mahi a calatē mahiharu taha a suraaṇā
cakkavaï calatē calaï cakka taha tihuaṇā ॥

lg.label: aha caüpaïyā
lg.l: caüpaïā chandā bhaṇaï phaṇindā caümattā gaṇa sattā ।
pāēhi saguru kari tīsa matta dhari caü saa asi a ṇiruttā ।
caü chanda lavijjaï ēkku ṇa kijjaï kō jāṇaï ēhu bhēū ।
kaḍa़ piṁgala bhāsaï chanda paāsaï miaṇaaṇi amia ēhū ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jasu sīsahi gaṁgā gōri adhaṁgā giva pahiria phaṇihārā ।
kaṁṭhaṭṭia vīsā pindhaṇa dīsā santāria saṁsārā ॥
kiraṇāvalikandā vandia candā ṇaaṇahi aṇala phurantā ।
sō sampaa dijjaü bahu suha kijjaü tumha bhavāṇīkantā ॥

lg.label: aha ghattā
lg.l: piṁgala kaī diṭṭhaü chanda ukiṭṭhaü ghatta matta bāsaṭṭi kari ।
caümatta satta gaṇa bē vipāa bhaṇa tiṇṇi tiṇi lahu anta dhari ॥
paḍhamaṁ daha bīsāmō bīē mattāĩ aṭṭhāī।
tīē tēraha viraī ghattā mattāī bāsaṭṭhi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: raṇadakkha dakkhahaṇu jiṇṇa kusumadhaṇu andhaagandhaviṇāsakaru ।
sō rakkhaü saṁkaru asurabhaaṁkaru gōri ṇāri addhaṁga dharu ॥

lg.label: aha ghattānanda
lg.l: sō ghattaha kulasāra kitti apāru ṇāarāa piṁgala kahaï ।
ēāraha vīsāma ṇandaü ṇāma puṇu vi satta tēraha viraï ॥
uḍḍuuṇahapaha bhamaü khagga riusīsahi jhallaü ।
pakkhara pakkhara ṭhēlli palli pavvaa apphālā ॥
hammīrakajju jajjala bhaṇaha kōhāṇalamaha maï jalaü ।
sulatāṇa sīsa karavāla daï tajji kalēvara dia calaü ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jō vandia sira gaṁga haṇia aṇaṁga addhaṁgahi parikara dharaṇu ।
sō jōī jaṇamitta haraü duritta saṁkāharu saṁkaracaraṇu ॥

lg.label: aha chappaü
lg.l: chappaa chanda chaïla suṇahu akkharasañjuttaü ।
ēāraha tasu viraï ta puṇu tēraha ṇibbhantaü ॥
bē mattā dhari paḍhama ta puṇu caü caü kala kijjaï ।
majjhaṭṭhia gaṇa pañca hēṭṭha biṇṇa vi lahu dijjaï ॥
ulāla viraï bē paṇṇaraha mattā aṭṭhāisa sōi ।
ēma bhaṇaha muṇaha chappaa paa aṇahā itthi ṇa kimpi hōi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: pindhaü diḍha saṇṇāha vāha uppara pakkhara daï ।
bandhu samadi raṇa dhasaü sāmi hammīra vaaṇa laï ॥
uḍḍuuṇahapaha bhamaü khagga riusīsahi jhallaü ।
pakkhara pakkhara ṭhēlli palli pavvaa apphālā ॥
hammīrakajju jajjala bhaṇaha kōhāṇalamaha maï jalaü ।
sulatāṇa sīsa karavāla daï tajji kalēvara dia calaü ॥
paa paa talaü ṇibaddha matta caübīsaha kijjaï ।
akkhara ḍambara sarisa chanda ia suddha bhaṇijjaï ॥
āihi chakkalu hōi cāri caükalaü ṇiruttaü ।
dukkala anta ṇibaddha sēsa kaï vatthu ṇivuttaü ।
bāvaṇṇa saü vi mattaha muṇahu ullālaü sahiaü guṇaha ।
chappaa chanda ērisi vi hōi kāĩ ganthi ganthi vi maraha ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jahā saraa sasi bimba jahā harahāra haṁsa ṭhia ।
jahā phula sia kamala jahā sirikhaṁḍa khaṁḍa kia॥
jahā gaṁga kallōla jahā rōsāṇia ruppaï ।
jahā duddhavara suddha phēṇa phamphāi talapphaï ॥
pia pāa pasāē diṭṭhi puṇu ṇihua hasaï jaha taruṇijaṇa ।
varamanti caṁḍasara kitti tua tattha dēkkha haribambha bhaṇa ॥

lg.label: aha kavva lakkhaṇa
lg.l: āi anta duhu chakkalaü tiṇṇi turaṁgama majjha ।
tīē jagaṇu ki vippagaṇu kavvaha lakkhaṇa bujjha ॥
caü aggala cālīsa guru ēkkakkē guru lēhu ।
jō guruhīṇaü sakka sō ṇāma ggahaṇa kuṇēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jasu kara phaṇivaï valaa taruṇivara taṇumaha vilasaï ।
ṇaaṇa aṇala gala garala vimala sasahara sira ṇivasaï ॥
surasari siramaha rahaï saalajaṇa durita damaṇa kara ।
hasi sasihara hara duria vihara hara atula abhaavara ॥
jaha jaha valaā vaḍḍihaḍa़ taha taha ṇāma kuṇēhu ।
sambhuhi saüm̐ bhaṇa bhiṁgagaṇa caüālīsa muṇēhu ॥
tā sakkō sambhō sūrō gaṁḍō khandhō vijaō dappō
tālaṁkō samarō sīhō sīsō uttēō paḍivakkhō ।
paridhamma marālu maïndō daṁḍō makkalu maaṇu marahō
vāsantō kaṁṭhō mōrō bandhō bhamarō bhiṇṇamaraṭṭhō ॥
valahadō rāō valiō mōhō santhāṇō bali mēhō
sahasakkhō bālō dariō sarahō dambhō'hō udambhō ।
valiaṁkō turaō hariṇō andhō muddhīē taha bhiṁgō
vatthūā ṇāmō piṁgalaṇāō jampaï chandapabandhō ॥
pacatālīsaha vatthuā chandē chanda viambha ।
addhā kaï piṁgala kahaï calaï ṇa harihara bambha ॥
paaha asuddhaü paṁguhīṇa khōḍaü paṇijjaï
mattaggala vāulaü suṇṇakala kaṇṇa suṇijjaï ।
jhalavajjia taha bahira andha laṁkāraha rahiaü
vulaü chanda uṭṭavaṇa attha viṇu dubbala kahiaü ॥
ḍēraü haṭṭakkharahiṁ hōi kāṇā guṇa savvahĩ rahia ।
savvaṁgasuddha samarūaguṇa chappaa dōsa piṁgalu kahia ॥
vippa hōi battīsa khatti bēāla kahijjasu ।
aṭhatālisa lahu vēsa sēsa suddaü salahijjasu ॥
caüaggala paü bīsa matta chāṇavaï ṭhavijjasu ।
pacatālīsaha ṇāma kavvalakkhaṇaha karijjasu ॥
chahabisa ullālahi ēkka kaï biṇṇi pāa chappaa muṇahu ।
samavaṇṇa sarisa samadōsaguṇa ṇāma aïhattari pari muṇahu ॥[chappa

lg.label: aha ullāla lakkhaṇa
lg.l: tiṇṇi turaṁgama tiala taha chaha caütia taha anta ।
aïma ullālā uṭṭavahu bihu dala chappaṇa manta ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jāā jā addhaṁga sīsa gaṁgā lōlantī
savvāhā pūranti savva dukkhā tōlantī ।
ṇāā rāā hāra dīsa vāsā bhāsantā
vēālā jā saṁga ṇacca duṭṭhā ṇāsantā ॥
ṇācantā kantā ucchavvē tālē bhūmī kampalē ।
jā diḍhē mōkkhā pāvijjē sō tumhāṇaṁ sukkha dē ॥
caüālisa guru kavvakē chahabīsaü ullāla ।
jaṁ guru ṭuṭṭaï lahu vaḍhaï ēhattari patthāra ॥

lg.label: [atha śālmalī prastāra]
lg.l: ajaa bēāsī akkharaü guru sattari ravirēha ।
ēkkakkhara vaḍha guru ghaṭaï dudui lahuā dēha ॥
ajaa vijaü bali kaṇṇa vīra bēāla vihaṇṇaru
makkalu hari hara bambha indu candaṇa susuhaṁkaru ।
sāṇa sīha sadūla kumma kōila khara kuñjaru
maaṇa maccha tālaṁka sēsa sāraṁga paōharu ॥
tā kunda kamalu vāraṇa bhasala sarahu jaṁgama sara bi lahaï ।
susaru samaru sārasu saraa chappaa ṇāma piṁgalu kaï ॥
mēru maaru maa siddhi buddhi karaalu kamalāaru
dhavala maṇaü dhua kaṇaü kisaṇu rañjaṇu mēhāaru ।
gimha garuḍa sasi sūra salla ṇavaraṁga maṇōharu
gaaṇu raaṇu ṇaru hīru bhamaru sēharu kusumāaru
tā dippu saṁkha vasu sadda muṇi ṇāarāa piṁgalu kahaï ।
chappaa ṇāma ēhattarihi chanda āra patthari lahaï ॥
jattē savvahi hōi lahu addha visajjahu tāma ।
taha vi visajjahu ēkkasaru ēhi pamāṇē ṇāma ॥iti ṣaṭpadaprakaraṇam ।

lg.label: aha pajjhaḍiā
lg.l: caümatta karaha gaṇa cāri ṭhāī ṭhavi anta paōhara pāī pāī।
caüsaṭṭhi matta pajjharaï indu sama cāri pāa pajjhaḍia chandu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jē gañjia gōḍāhivaï rāu udaṁḍa āḍḍa jasu bhaa palāu ।
guruvikkama vikkama jiṇia jujjha tā kaṇṇa parakkama kōi bujjha ॥

lg.label: aha aḍillā
lg.l: sōlaha mattā pāu alillaha bē vi jamakkā bhēu aḍillaha ।
hō ṇa paōhara kimpi aḍillaha anta supia bhaṇa chandu aḍillaha ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jiṇi āsāvari dēsā diṇhaü sutthira ḍāhararajjā liṇhaü ।
kālañjara jiṇī kittī thappia dhaṇu āvajjia dhammaka appia ॥

lg.label: pādākulaka chanda
lg.l: lahu guru ēkka ṇiama ṇahi jēhā paa paa lakkhaü uttamarēhā ।
sukaï pharṇidaha kaṁṭhaha vala sōlahamattaṁ pāākulaaṁ ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: sēra ēka jaï pāvaüm̐ dhittā maṁḍā vīsa pakāvaüm̐ ṇittā ।
ṭaṁku ēka jaü saïndhava pāā jō haü raṁka sōi haü rāā ॥

lg.label: caübōlā chanda
lg.l: sōlaha mattaha bē vi pamāṇahu bīa caütthahĩ cāridahā ।
mattaha saṭṭhi samaggala jāṇahu cāri paā caübōla kahā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: rē dhaṇi mattamaaṁgaagāmiṇi khañjaṇalōaṇi candamuhī ।
cañcala juvvaṇa jāta ṇa jāṇahi chaïla samappaï kāī ṇahī ॥

lg.label: paa bīa bāraha ṭhavahu
lg.l: tīa ṭhāi dahapañca jāṇahu
cārima ēggārahahĩ
pañcamē hi daha pañca āṇahu
aṭṭhā saṭṭhī pūravahu aggē dōhā dēhu ।
rāasēṇa supasiddha ia raḍḍa bhaṇijjaï ēhu ॥
visama tikala saṁṭhavahu tiṇṇi pāikka karahu laï
anta ṇarinda ki vippa paḍhama bē matta avara paï ।
samapaa tia pāikka savvalahu anta visajjahu
caüṭhā caraṇa vicāri ēka lahu kahia lijjahu ॥
ima pañca pāa uṭṭavaṇa kaï vatthu ṇāma piṁgala kuṇaï ।
ṭhavi dōsahīṇa dōhā caraṇa rāasēṇa raḍḍaha bhaṇaï ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: bhamaï mahuara phulla aravinda ṇava kēsukāṇaṇa julia ।
savvadēsa pikarāva vullia siala pavaṇa lahu vahaï ॥
malaakuhara ṇavavalli pēllia ।
citta maṇōbhavasara haṇaï dūra digantara kanta ।
kima pari appaü vārihaü ima paripalia duranta ॥
karahī ṇandā mōhiṇī cārusēṇi taha bhadda ।
rāasēṇa tālaṁka pia satta vatthu ṇipphanda ॥
paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha tēraha mattā jāsu ।
bīa caüttha ēgārahahĩ karahi bhaṇijjaï tāsu ॥

lg.label: [nandā lakṣaṇa
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha matta hōi daha cāri ।
bīa caüttha ēgārahahĩ ṇanda bhaṇiñja viāri ॥

lg.label: [mōhinī lakṣaṇa
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha ṇava daha mattā jāsu ।
bīa caüttha ēgārahahiṁ taṁ mōhiṇī muṇiāsu ॥

lg.label: [cārusēnā lakṣaṇa
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha matta paṇṇaraha jāsu ।
bīa caütha ēārahahĩ cārusēṇi muṇiāsu ॥

lg.label: bhidrā lakṣaṇa]
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha mattā dahapañcāi ।
bīa caütthē bārahahĩ bhadda ṇāma kahiāi ॥

lg.label: rājasēnā lakṣaṇa]
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha matta paṇṇaraha pajattha ।
sama bāraha aru ēkkadaha rāasēṇu bhaṇu tattha ॥

lg.label: [tālaṁkinī lakṣaṇa]
lg.l: paḍhama tīa pañcama paaha mattā sōlaha jāsu ।
sama bāraha aru ēkkadaha tālaṁkiṇi bhaṇu tāsu ॥

lg.label: (padmāvatī chandaḥ)
lg.l: bhaṇu paümāvattī ṭhāṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ caümattā gaṇa aṭṭhāā।
dhua kaṇṇō karaalu vippō caraṇō pāē pāa ukiṭṭhāā ॥
jaï palaï paōhara kimaï maṇōhara pīḍaï taha ṇāakkaguṇō ।
piaraha santāsaï kaï uvvāsaï ia caṁḍālacaritta gaṇē ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: bhaa bhajjia vaṁgā bhaṁgu kaliṁgā tēlaṁgā raṇa mukki calē ।
marahaṭṭhā dhiṭṭhā laggia kaṭṭhā sōhā bhaa pāa palē ॥
campāraṇa kampā pavvaa jhampā ātthā ātthī jīva harē ।
kāsīsara rāṇā kiaü paāṇā vijjāhara bhaṇa mantivarē ॥

lg.label: [atha kuṁḍaliyā chanda]
lg.l: dōhā lakkhaṇa paḍhama paḍhi kavvaha addha ṇirutta ।
kuṁḍaliā buhaaṇa muṇahu ulālē sañjutta ।
ullālē sañjutta jamaka suddhaü salahijjaï ।
caüālaha saü matta sukaï diḍhabandhu kahijjaï ।
caālaha saü matta jāsu taṇu bhūṣaṇa sōhā ।
ēma kuṁḍaliā jāṇahu paḍhama jaha paḍhiaï dōhā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: ḍhāllā māria ḍhilli maham̐ mucchi. mēcchasarīra ।
pura jajjallā mantivara calia vīra hammīra ॥
calia vīra hammīra pāabhara mēiṇi kampaī ।
diga maga ṇaha andhāra dhūli sūraha raha jhampaï ॥
diga maga ṇaha andhāra āṇa khurasāṇaka āllā ।
daramari damasi vipakkha māru ḍhillī maham̐ ḍhāllā ॥

lg.label: [atha gaganāṁgacchandaḥ]
lg.l: paa paa ṭhavahu jāṇi gaaṇaṁgaü matta vihūsiṇā
bhāaü bīsa kalaa saraaggala lahu gurusēsiṇā ॥
paḍhamahi matta cāri gaṇa kijjahu gaṇaha paāsiō
bīsakkhara saala paaha pia guru anta paāsiō ॥
paḍhamahi cakkalu hōi gaṇa antahi dijjahu hāru ।
bīsakkhara gaaṇaṁga bhaṇu matta pacīsa viāru ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: bhañjia malaa cōlavaï ṇipalia gañjia guñjarā
mālavarāa malaagiri lukkia parihari kuñjarā ।
khurāsāṇa khuhia raṇa maham̐ laṁghia muhia sāarā
hammīra calia hārava palia riugaṇaha kāarā ॥

lg.label: [atha dvipadīchandaḥ]
lg.l: āiga indu jattha hō paḍhamahi dijjaï tiṇi dhaṇuharaṁ
taha pāikajuala parisaṁṭhavahu vivihacittasundaraṁ ॥
sarasaï laïa pasāu taha puhavī karahi kaïtta kaïaṇā
mahuaracaraṇa anta laï dijjahu dōaï muṇahu buhaaṇā ॥
chakkalu muha saṁṭhāvi kaï cakkalu pañca ṭhavēhu ।
antahi ēkkaḍa़ hāra daï dōaï chanda kahēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: dāṇava dēva bē vi dukkantaü girivara sihara kampiō
haagaapāaghāa utaü dhūlihi gaaṇa jhampiō ॥

lg.label: [atha jhullaṇa-jhūlanā-chandaḥ]
lg.l: paḍhama daha dijjiā puṇa vi taha kijjiā puṇa vi daha satta taha viraï jāā ।
ēma pari bi bihu dala matta satatīsa pala ēhu kahu jhulaṇā ṇāarāā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: sahasa maamatta gaa lākha lakha pakkharia
sāhi dui sāji khēlanta gindū ।
kōppi pia jāhi taha thappi jasu vimala mahi
jiṇaï ṇahi kōi tuha tuluka hindū ॥

lg.label: [khañjā chandaḥ]
lg.l: dhua dharia diavara ṇava gaṇa kamalaṇaaṇi
buhaaṇa maṇa suhaï ju jima sasi raaṇi sōhaē ।
puṇa via viraï bihu paa gaavaragamaṇi
ragaṇa para phaṇivaï bhaṇa sumaru buhaaṇa mōhaē ॥
bihu dala ṇava pala vippagaṇa jōhala anta ṭhavēhu ।
matta iālisa khañja paa dahagaṇa tattha muṇēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: ahi lalaï mahi calaï giri khasaï hara khalaï

lg.l: paḍhama caraṇa sasivaaṇi miaṇaaṇi ṇava diagaṇa
paala puṇa vi taha raaṇa ṭhavahu antaē kaṇṇō ।
piṁgala ṇāa bhaṇantā mālā sēsaṁ pi gāhamma ॥
paḍhama hōi ṇava vippagaṇa jōhala kaṇṇa ṭhavēhu ।
gāhā addhā anta daï mālā chanda kahēhu ॥

lg.label: [culiālā chandaḥ]
lg.l: culiālā jaï dēha kimu dōhā uppara mattaha pañcaï ।
paa paa uppara saṁṭhavahu suddha kusumagaṇa antaha dijjaï ॥
dōhā saṁkhā saṁṭhahu umpari pañcaï matta ।
aṭṭhadahuppari bīsa dui culiālā ukkhitta ॥

lg.label: [atha sōṭuā chandaḥ ]
lg.l: sō sōraṭṭhaü jāṇa jaṁ dōhā viparīa ṭhia ।
paa paa jamaka vakhāṇa ṇāarāa piṁgala kahia ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: sō māṇia puṇavanta jāsu bhatta paṁḍia taṇaa ।
jāsu ghariṇi guṇavanti sō vi puhavi saggaha ṇilaa ॥

lg.label: [atha hākali chandaḥ]
lg.l: sagaṇā bhagaṇā diagaṇaī matta caüddaha paa palaī ।
saṁṭhaï vaṁkō viraha tahā hākali rūaü ēhu kahā ॥
matta caüddaha paḍhama dala ēāraha vaṇṇēhi ।
duha akkhara uttara dalahi hākali chanda kahēhi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: uccaü chāaṇa vimala dharā taruṇī ghariṇī viṇaaparā ।
vittaka pūrala muddaharā varisā samaā sukkhakarā ॥

lg.label: [atha madhubhāracchanda]
lg.l: jasu palaï sakkha paaharaha ēka ।
caümatta bē vi mahubhāra ēvi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jasu canda sīsa pindhaṇaha dīsa ।
sō sambhu ēu tuha subbha dēu ॥

lg.l: gāraha matta karīja anta paōhara dīja।
ēhu suchanda ahīra jaṁghaï piṁgala vīra ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: sundari gujjari ṇāri lōaṇa dīha visāri ।
pīṇa paōharabhāra lōlaï mōttiahāra ॥

lg.label: [atha daṇḍakacchandaḥ
lg.l: kuntaaru dhaṇuddharu haavaru chakkalu bi bi pāikka dalē
battīsaha mattaha paa supasiddhaü jāṇaha buhaaṇa hiaatalē ।
saübīsa aṭhaggala kala sampuṇṇaü rūaü phaṇi bhāsia bhuaṇē
daṁḍaala ṇiruttaü guru sañjuttaü piṁgala aṁ japanta maṇē ॥

lg.label: [atha siṁhāvalōkacchandaḥ]
lg.l: gaṇa vippa sagaṇa dhari paaha paaṁ bhaṇa siṁhaalōaṇa chanda varaṁ ।
guṇi gaṇa maṇa bujjhahu ṇāa bhaṇā ṇahi jagaṇu ṇa bhagaṇu ṇa kaṇṇa gaṇā ॥
vippa sagaṇa paa bē vi gaṇa anta visajjahi hāra ।

lg.label: [atha plavaṁgamacchandaḥ]
lg.l: jattha paḍhama chaa matta paappaa dijjaē pañcamatta caümatta gaṇā ṇahi kijjaē।
sambhali anta lahū guru ēkkaka cāhaē muddhi paaṁgama chanda viakkhaṇa sōhaē ॥
paa paa āihi guruā piṁgala pabhaṇēi saala ṇibbhantī ।
chanda pavaṁgama diṭṭhō mattāṇaṁ ēkabīsantī ॥
tikkalu caükala pañcakala tia gaṇa dūra karēhu ।
chakkalu tiṇi palanta jēhi lahu guru anta muṇēhu ॥187 kā

lg.l: guru lahu ṇahi ṇimma ṇimma ṇahi akkhara palaï paōhara visama samaṁ
jahi kahum̐ ṇahi ṇimmaha tarala turaa jimi parasa vidisa disa agamagamaṁ ।
gaṇa pañca caükkala palaï ṇirantara anta sagaṇa dhua kanta gaṇaṁ
paricalaï supari pari līla lilāvaï kala battīsa visāmakaraṁ ॥

lg.l: ghara laggaï aggi jalaï dhaha dhaha kaï diga maga ṇahapaha aṇala bharē

bhaa lukkia thakkia vahari taruṇijaṇa bhaïrava bhēria sadda palē
mahi lāi paṭṭaï riusira ṭuṭṭaï jakkhaṇa vīra hamīra calē ॥

lg.label: [atha harigītā chandaḥ]
lg.l: gaṇa cāri pañcakkala ṭhavijjasu bīa ṭhāmahi chakkalō
paa paaha antahi guru karijjasu vaṇṇaṇēṇa susavvalō ।
daha cāri dukkaḍa़ dahadu māṇahu matta ṭhāisa pāaō
harigīa chanda pasiddha jāṇahu piṁgalēṇa paāsiō ॥
bīē chakkalu ṭhāvi kahu cāri pañcakkala dēhu ।
bāraha uttara matta saü māṇasu aṁga ṭhavēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: gaa gaahi dukkia taraṇi lukkia turaa turaahi jujjhiā
raha rahahi mīlia dharaṇi pīḍia appa para ṇahi bujjhiā ।
bala milia āia patti dhāiu kampa girivarasīharā
ucchalaï sāara dīṇa kāara vaïra vaḍḍia dīharā ॥

lg.label: [atha tribhaṁgī chanda]
lg.l: paḍhamaṁ daha rahaṇaṁ aṭṭhavi rahaṇaṁ puṇu vasu rahaṇaṁ rasarahaṇaṁ
antē guru sōhaï mahiala mōhaï siddha sarāhaï varataruṇaṁ ।
jaï palaï paōhara kimaï maṇōhara haraï kalēvara tāsu kaī
tibbhaṁgī chandaṁ sukkhāṇandaṁ bhaṇaï pharṇidō vimalamaī ॥

lg.label: jahāṁ
lg.l: sira kijjia gaṁgaṁ gōri adhaṁgaṁ haṇiaaṇaṁgaṁ puradahaṇaṁ
kiaphaṇivaïhāraṁ tihuaṇasāraṁ vandiachāraṁ riumahaṇaṁ ।
surasēviacaraṇaṁ muṇigaṇasaraṇaṁ bhavabhaaharaṇaṁ sūladharaṁ
sāṇandiavaaṇaṁ sundaraṇaaṇaṁ girivarasaaṇaṁ ṇamaha haraṁ ॥

lg.label: [atha durmilā chandaḥ]
lg.l: tīsa dui mattaha ēri sam̐juttaha buhaaṇa rāa bhaṇanti ṇarā
visama tia ṭhāmahi ērisa bhāahi paa paa dīsaï kaṇṇa gharā ।
tā daha paḍhama ḍhāvē aṭṭha aṁ tīa caüddaha kia ṇilaō
jō ērisi chandē tihuaṇavandē sō jaṇa bujjhaü dummilaō ॥
daha vasu caüdaha viraha karu visama kaṇṇa gaṇa dēhu ।
antara vippa païkka gaṇa dummila chanda kahēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā

āḍḍā uḍḍāvia kittī pāvia mōḍia mālavarāabalē
tēlaṁgā bhaggia bahuriṇa laggia kāsīrāā ja khaṇa calē ॥

lg.label: [atha hīracchandaḥ]
lg.l: ṇāa pabhaṇa tiṇṇi chagaṇa anta karahi jōhalaṁ
hāra ṭhavia puṇu vi supia vippagaṇahi savvalaṁ ।
tiṇi dharahi bē vi karahi anta ragaṇa lakkhaē
kōi jaṇaï dappa bhaṇaï hīra sukaï pakkhaē ॥
hāra supia bhaṇa vippagaṇa tīē bhiṇṇa sarīra ।
jōhala antē saṁṭhavahu tēisa mattaha hīra ॥

lg.label: jahā

lg.label: [atha jalaharaṇacchandaḥ]
lg.l: paa paḍhama palaï jahĩ suṇahi kamalamuhi daha vasu puṇu vasu viraḍa़ karē
saba paa muṇi diagaṇa dia virama sagaṇa siriphaṇivaï bhaṇa sukaïvarē ।
daha tiguṇa karahi kala puṇa vi dhari juala ēma pari pariṭhaü caücaraṇā
jaï palaï kavahu guru kavahu ṇa pariharu buhaaṇa maṇaharu jalaharaṇā ॥
battīsa hōi mattā antē sagaṇāĩ ṭhāvēhi ।
savva lahū jaï guruā ēkkō vā bē vi pāēhi ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: khura khura khudi khudi mahi ghaghara rakha kalaï ṇaṇaṇagidi kari turaa calē
ṭaṭaṭagidi palaï ṭapu dhasaï dharaṇi dhara cakamaka kara bahu disi camalē ।
calu damaki damaki dalu cala païkabalu ghulaki ghulaki karivara laliā
vada maṇusaala karaï vipakha hiaa sala hamira vīra jaba raṇa caliā ॥

lg.label: [atha maaṇaharā chandaḥ]
lg.l: pia bhaṇami maṇōharu palli paōharu suhava suhāva susiddha khaṇō thira karahi maṇō
jaï rāa vivattiu aṇusara khattia kaṭṭhikaē bahi chanda bhaṇō jima khalaï riṇō ।
bi bi salla pahillia turaa vahillia haa gaa paa pasaranta dharā guru sajjikarā
jaï jaggi ṇiruttaü dahagaṇajuttaü caü sandhihi cālīsa dharā bhaṇu maaṇaharā ॥
bē vi matta sira ṭhāvi kahu valaā anta ṭhavēhu ।
ṇava caükala gaṇa majjha dhari maaṇaharāĩ karēhu ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jiṇi kaṁsa viṇāsia kitti paāsia muṭṭhi ariṭṭi viṇāsa karē giri hattha dharē
jamalajjuṇa bhañjia paabhara gañjia kālia kula saṁhāra karē jasa bhuaṇa bharē ।
cāṇūra vihaṁḍia ṇiakula maṁḍia rāhāmuha mahupāṇa karē jimi bhamaravarē
sō tumha ṇarāaṇa viṣpaparāaṇa cittaha cintia dēu varā bhaabhīaharā ॥
caüsandhihi cālīsa kala daha gaṇa tattha muṇēhu ।
paahara vajjia hē supia maaṇaharāĩ kuṇēhu ॥

lg.label: [atha marahaṭṭhā chandaḥ]
lg.l: ēhu chanda sulakkhaṇa bhaṇaï viakkhaṇa jampaï piṁgala ṇāu
visamaï daha akkhara puṇu aṭṭhakkhara puṇu ēgāraha ṭhāu ।
gaṇa āihi chakkalu pañca caükkulu anta guru lahu dēhu
saü sōlaha aggala matta samaggala bhaṇa marahaṭṭhā ēhu ।208॥

lg.label: trayōdaśākṣara prastāra māyā chandaḥ
lg.l: kaṇṇā duṇṇā cāmara sallā jualā jaṁ bīhā dīhā gandhaajuggā paalā taṁ ।
antē kantā cāmara hārā suhakāā bāīsā mattā guṇajuttā bhaṇu māā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: ē atthīrā dēvakhu sarīrā gharu jāā bittā puttā sōara mittā savu māā ।
kāhē lāgī babbara vēlāvasi mujjhē ēkkā kittī kijjaï juttī jaï sujjhē ॥

lg.label: tāraka chandaḥ
lg.l: ṭhaï āi lahū jua pāa karījē guru sallajuā bhagaṇā jua dījē ।
paa antaha pāi guru jua kijjē sahi tāraa chandaha ṇāma bhaṇijjē ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: ṇava mañjari lijjia cūaha gāchē pariphullia kēsu ṇaā vaṇa āchē ।
jaḍa़ ēsthi digantara jāihi kantā kia vammaha ṇatthi ki ṇatthi vasantā ॥

lg.label: kanda chandaḥ
lg.l: dhaā tūra hārō puṇō tūra hārēṇa guru sadda kijjē a ēkkā taārēṇa ।
kaīsā kalā kandu jampijja ṇāēṇa asō hōi cō aggalā savva pāēṇa ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: ṇa rē kaṁsa jāṇēhi hō ēkka bālā i haūm̐ dēvaīputta tō vaṁsakālāi ।
tahā gēṇhu kaṁsō jaṇāṇandakandēṇa jahā hatti diṭṭhō ṇiāṇārivindēṇa ॥

lg.label: paṁkāvalī chandaḥ
lg.l: cāmara paḍhamahi pāpa gaṇō dhua salla caraṇa gaṇa ṭhāvahi taṁ jua ।
sōlaha kalaa paē paa jāṇia piṁgala pabhaṇaï paṁkaavālia ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jō jaṇa jaṇamaü sō guṇamantaü jē kara para uaāra hasantaü ।
jē puṇa para uaāra virujjhaü tāsu jaṇaṇi ki ṇa thakkaḍa़ vañjhaü ॥

lg.label: caturdaśākṣarakhastāra vasantatilakā
lg.l: kaṇṇō païjja paḍhamē jagaṇō a bīē antē turaṁga saaṇō yaa tattha pāē ।
uttā vasantatilaā phaṇiṇā kiṭṭhā chēā paḍhanti sarasā sukaïndadiṭṭhā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jē tīa tikkhacalacakkhutihāadivā tē kāma canda mahu pañcama māraṇijjā ।
jēsaṁ uṇō ṇivaḍiā saalā vi diṭṭhī ciṭunti tē tilajalañjalidāṇajōggā ॥

lg.label: cakrapada chandaḥ
lg.l: sambhaṇia caraṇa gaṇa palia muhō saṁṭhavia puṇavi diavarajualō ।
jaṁ karaalagaṇa paa paa muṇiō cakkapaa pabhaṇa phaṇivaï bhaṇiō ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: khañjaṇajuala ṇaaṇavara upamā cārukaṇaalaï bhuajua susamā ।
phulakamalamuhi gaavaragamaṇī kassa sukiaphala vihi gaḍhu taruṇī ॥

lg.label: pañcadaśākṣaraprastāra bhramarāvalī chandaḥ
lg.l: kara pañca pasiddha viladdhavaraṁ raaṇaṁ pabhaṇanti maṇōhara chandavaraṁ raaṇaṁ ।
guru pañca dahā lahu ērisiaṁ raïaṁ bhamarāvali chanda pasiddha kiaṁ ṭhaviaṁ ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: tua dēva durittagaṇāharaṇā caraṇā jaï pāvaü candakalābharaṇā saraṇā ।
paripūjaü tējjia lōbha maṇā bhavaṇā suha dē maha sōkaviṇāsamaṇā samaṇā ॥

lg.label: sāraṁgikā chandaḥ
lg.l: kaṇṇā diṇṇā sattā antē ēkā hārā māṇīā
paṇṇārāhā hārā sāraṁgikkā chandā jāṇīā ।
tīsā mattā pāē pattā bhōīrāā jampantā
chandā kijjē kittī lijjē sūṇī matthā kampantā ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: mattā jōhā vaḍḍē kōhā appāappī gavvīā rōsārattā savvā gattā sā bhallā uṭṭhīā ।
hatthījūhā sajjā huā pāē bhūmī kampantā lēhī dēhī chōḍō āḍḍō savvā sūrā jampantā ॥

lg.label: cāmara chandaḥ
lg.l: cāmarassa bīsa matta tīṇī matta aggalā aṭṭa hāra satta sāra ṭhāi ṭhāi ṇimmalā ।
āi anta hāra sāra kāmiṇī muṇijjaē akkharā dahāi pañca piṁgalē bhaṇijjaē ॥

lg.label: jahā
lg.l: jhatti jōha sajja hōha gajja vajja taṁ khaṇā rōsa ratta savva gatta hakka dijja bhīsaṇā ।
dhāi āi khagga pāi dāṇavā calantaā vīrapāa ṇāarāa kampa bhūtalantaā ॥
